title: What makes you feel powerful?
body:
Knowing your shit?
Getting an ace every teamfight?
Knowing your shit and knowing what to do with it?
Thinking outside the box?

replies.body:
Dive down to bronze 5 and do this...
This also works on other champions of your choosing...
I lose games because of smurfs

getting kills without trying 

eg.100 hp wukong walks into my lane
Jumping in and landing that ever elusive 5-man blind.
not being a faggot like OP

Playing a new champ, and instantly clicking into their playstyle.

Aiming wonky skillshots, or multiple angled skillshots. For example, an opponent's hiding behind his minions, so i use zed's W to place my shadow behind the minions, and then cast my Q at him from around the minions. I dunno, something about working out angles on the fly and predicting movement feels like i'm outplaying my opponent when all I'm doing is getting some poke in.

Landing the perfect combo with twisted fate. Ulting to bottom lane with a gold card ready, hitting the ADC, throwing a Q right in their face, getting the E passive trigger for extra damage and igniting to kill them before running back into mid lane.

Doing an ult>Q combo onto an ADC to smack them back into my team as Vi, or usign Flash+Q to initiate a gank and killing the enemy laner in 2-3 hits.

Getting a Darius multi-kill with the ult. Especially when I get ganked 2v1 or 3v1 and I can outplay them to score a double or triple.

Just thinking outside the box and outplaying my opponents. Sure, being fed from a crappy lane opponent and steamrolling the enemy team is fun, but that doesn't make me feel POWER, it just makes me laugh at how much they fed me. What truly makes you feel great is knowing that you an your opponent were close to the same level of skill, and you won because you managed to outplay them and think of scenarios out of the box, or just great mechanical knowledge in general.

If I can make enemies and allies use /all chat after the first min into the game.

Feel the power!
Running a +20 penetration rune page on burst champs, them late game bursts sooo good!
I feel I've got pretty good knowledge but Wet Paper Bag 5 mechanics. TBH I get sick hard ons when I Skill+Flash plays. I probs do too many of them these days tho
